question: Question_06_(a)
statement:
Combine the sum of the iterated integrals

\[I=\int_0^1\int_{-\sqrt{y}}^{\sqrt{y}}f(x,y)\textrm{d}x\textrm{d}y+\int_1^4\int_{y-2}^{\sqrt{y}}f(x,y)\textrm{d}x\textrm{d}y\]

into a single iterated integral with the order of integration reversed.
hints:
Try making a sketch of the region of integration first, rather than
trying to tackle this problem from a purely algebraic standpoint.
